app_intro_text: A platform for investors and fundraisers. Both investors and fundraisers can take advantage of this platform by funding on the projects or raising fund for thier ideas.
create_profile_message: Create your investment profile and wait for the projects to come up.
choose_account_type_message: Create you company(ies) profile and wait for investors.
participate_message: Search for projects need fund or create your own campaign to raise fund.
mission_message: Democratizing Investment, educating funders & enabling creators to stimulate the Vietnamese economy through next-generation solutions.
how_works_step_1_text: A company creates an online profile and submits its funding campaign
how_works_step_3_text: Campaign launch: investors review the company, participate in the conversation, commit to invest
how_works_step_4_text: Companies approve & close investor commitments, documents signed, funds transferred
fill_contact_form_message: Fill up the form and our team will get back to you within 24 hours.

title: Flocks AI
sub_title: Investing together to build the future.
cover_p1: Flocks is Vietnam’s first AI Investment platform that will change the way businesses are funded, how everyday people invest, and the way our economy grows.
cover_p2: Join Flocks AI now and help vastly increase access to capital for businesses and passive income-generating investments for everyone. Together we will give new and existing businesses opportunities to reinvigorate and expand the Vietnamese economy.

more_text_p1: To rapidly sign up as many investors as possible Flocks AI will allow the first 10,000 accounts to claim 100,000 Dong each. For this to happen, we first want to launch a major challenge: by giving the first 1000 sign-ups a referral link that will share 1% of Flocks AI revenue for 3 months after the official platform launch. This challenge will create a long-term partnership between the first 1000 investors.
more_text_p2: How can you become a Flocks AI Investor?
more_text_p6: To reward everyone that helps promote and populate Flocks AI, we have developed a list of challenges, leader boards, badges, rewards to make our launch journey profitable for all.
more_text_p7: We are only a few months away from the national launch and we need you to help us along the way. We believe that if we profit you should too so by becoming one of the first one thousand you will receive your free share of Flocks AI income and join creators, entrepreneurs and investors in building a whole new future for Vietnam. Currently, we are looking for influencers, KOLs, motivated creators, inspirational leaders, and team players, we plan to build an industry around you, and becoming a full-time influencer can no longer just be a dream but a reality. It is still early, which means everyone has a fair chance, it all depends on how you perform. Imagine getting paid to do what you do best to influence trends, inform the masses about the next big startups and businesses in Vietnam, all while you manage your flock of birds that drive campaigns and expand the Flocks AI platform. Our early testing results make us optimistic that Flocks AI will connect the first million individual funders in one commonly owned platform that will change Vietnam for generations to come.
more_text_p8: For the first time in our lives, we have a chance to affect a certain outcome, we can make sure that vetted, qualified businesses get funded.
more_text_p9: At Flocks AI, we are obsessed with the idea that technology can let us do something collectively that can change our country for the better and increase individual empowerment and equality of opportunity on a national scale.
more_text_p10: Entrepreneurial progress will lead to unprecedented economic growth. Everyone should have a chance to own a fair share of the future profits of Vietnam’s economic growth from Hà Giang in the north to Ca Mau in the South. The launch of Flocks AI is only the first step on the long road towards this goal.
more_text_p11: If this sounds exciting, join us NOW!

I_understand_I_may_never: I understand I may never become an equity holder, only a beneficial owner of equity interest in the Company.

find_your_flock_p1: Vietnam needs you!  Venture Capital is powerful because it provides capital to companies with high growth potential. Shopee, Grab, MoMo are examples of businesses that grew because of venture capital investors. The more investors that exist, the more businesses that have a chance to receive funding to help change the future of Vietnam.   For the first time, Flocks A.I. is bridging emerging businesses and individual funders. This changes everything, now digital distribution of ownership in the next big businesses can be owned by everyone rather than just big venture capital firms.
find_your_flock_p2: Join Flocks A.I. now and help vastly increase access to capital for businesses and passive income-generating investments for everyone.   Together we will give new and existing businesses opportunities to reinvigorate and expand the Vietnamese economy.
design_the_future_p1: Scale-ups and Startups are changing Vietnam. Now you can decide which ones you will help to be successful by investing in them
reap_the_benifits_p1: Own apart of  Vietnam's next Unicon by Investin now. Even before a scale-up or startup is Successful you can trade their shares on our secondary marketplace, start earning profit today.
be_your_own_boss_p1: As an investor, when you choose the right scale-ups and start-ups their success will give you the financial freedom to live the way you want.
cost_you_nothing_p1: We charge no fees to investors and you can invest with your debit or  credit card and even crypto.
everyone_wins_p1: As long as you are over 18 years old, you can invest and have a chance to earn and grow!
every_little_counts_p1: From as low as 1,000,000.00 Dong or 1,000,000,000.00 we are ready to serve you with flocks of investments that suits your comfort and risk appetite.
on_flocks_ai_p1: After creating your profile our AI recommendation system will advise you on the most suitable scale-ups and startups for you. Once you have done your own research on any deal,  then decide how much you want invest in the deal you like.
pick_your_flock_p1: Flocks AI aims to launch more companies in Vietnam than any other platform, this means more chances for you to win, when you win, everyone wins the economy, scale ups and startups alike. If our AI recommendations are not enough for you, simply search any key word and see what flys up to invest in now. If there is a type of company that you don’t see recommend one you like to raise capital on Flocks AI and tell us about it!
promote_your_flock_p1: Now that you have invested in a project you can help them be more successful. Share your investment on your personal social media page, refer others to invest along with you and join your flock. Create positive fan memes, vidoes and other elements that can boost any company you invest in and get rewarded.
portfolio_your_flock_p1: Our digital portfolio platform allows you to manage  and track all of your investments in one place.
confirm_password_invalid_length_message: Confirm Password must be at least 8 characters
investor_profile_in_completed_message: You don't have any investment Profile. Now you can create your investment profile then you can start investing on them.
